screenshots.caption: StormForce v0.5.3 - Now with StormTracker support

name: StormForce
short_description: StormForce is a free open source program written in Python/PyGame for the Boltek LD-250/StormTracker. StormForce works in FreeBSD, Linux, and Microsoft Windows.
